description: The SPP4105B/17 Home Office 10-Outlet Surge Protector protects up to ten devices and saves energy doing it. For maximum savings and protection, auto-sensing technology automatically turns all of your devices on or off based on the master outlet, and Power Blocker technology automatically shuts down power to your devices after a surge event. And because the surge protector features integrated RJ11 and coaxial connections, it allows you to guard your modem and router from surges in your telephone, DSL, or cable line. Even if your home office never experiences the type of event that causes instant damage, this surge protector can extend the life of your computer equipment by reducing the wear and tear caused by minor fluctuations in electrical current.Simplicity is. . .a Surge Protector thatprotectsyour Home Office equipment andsaves energydoing it
title: Philips SPP4105B/17 10-Outlet Home Office Surge Protector
